verses.name: John 20:5
verses.text: And he stooping down, and looking in, saw the linen clothes lying; yet went he not in.

verses.name: John 20:6
verses.text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him, and went into the sepulchre, and seeth the linen clothes lie,

verses.name: John 20:7
verses.text: And the napkin, that was about his head, not lying with the linen clothes, but wrapped together in a place by itself.

verses.name: John 20:8
verses.text: Then went in also that other disciple, which came first to the sepulchre, and he saw, and believed.

verses.name: John 20:9
verses.text: For as yet they knew not the scripture, that he must rise again from the dead.

verses.name: John 20:10
verses.text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home.
